body_html:
As @brge17 pointed out, the package organization is a bit nuanced. You could use aliases instead as well:

import tensorflow as tf

Progbar = tf.keras.utils.Progbar

Closing this since we are unlikely to change package organization in the near future.
body_text:
As @brge17 pointed out, the package organization is a bit nuanced. You could use aliases instead as well:
import tensorflow as tf

Closing this since we are unlikely to change package organization in the near future.
body:
As @brge17 pointed out, the package organization is a bit nuanced. You could use aliases instead as well:

```python
import tensorflow as tf

Progbar = tf.keras.utils.Progbar
```

Closing this since we are unlikely to change package organization in the near future.
